productDetails.desc: Inspired by vintage mountain gear, the J.Crew Nordic Collection is engineered to keep you frost-free on the chilliest days. Built to endure everything from flurries to blizzards with eco-friendly, high-performance materials, our warmest layers are designed to look sharp in all conditions, whether you're hiking a mountain or trekking closer to home. The Nordic puffer vest is made with a recycled-nylon shell and filled with PrimaLoft Rise, a lightweight insulation made entirely from plastic bottles.
